comment.author: 44124470032@N01
comment._content: It's really amazing seeing this picture of one of Copenhagen's most beautiful parks. I couldn't help myself taking this picture today. The shrubbery and trees have grown a lot since then, but otherwise it looks the same. I also learned something today that the park actually is named Ørstedsparken and not what we call it: H. C. Ørstedsparken ;-)

comment.author: 87844368@N00
comment._content: Great photo and great follow-up, dreadyboy - blogged it here

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
dreadyboy: Worth noticing indeed - Hans Christian Ørsted, famous Danish physicist and chemist, born in 1777. I surely will visit this park next time I'm in Copenhagen :-)
/Anna B
